  • LESS

LESS¶

Bootstrap provides a wealth of really useful mixins. Priemr adds a few more.

Mixins¶

.transform(@arguments); CSS3 transform property. Accepts arguments as entered.
.transform-style(@transformStyle); CSS3 transform-style property.
.persepective(@perspective); CSS3 perspective property.
.backface-visibility(@visibility); CSS3 backface-visibility property.
.image-set(@imageOne, @imageTwo); New property for supporting multiple image sizes for backgrounds.
.tab-size(@tabSize: 4); CSS3 tab-size property for controlling the number of spaces a tab takes up.
.dragCursor(); Spits out the necessary css for an open and closed hand dragging cursor. Useful for building drag and drop interfaces.
